trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"></xref> classes.
Gets or sets the name of the category the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> is grouped with in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定類別目錄的名稱<xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref>中群組[!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)]工作列跳躍清單。

trans-unit.source: If the CustomCategory property is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty>, the item is added to the **Tasks** category.
trans-unit.target: 如果 CustomCategory 屬性為`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty>，將項目加入**工作**類別目錄。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: If a value is specified, the item is added to a category that uses the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值，將項目會加入的類別，使用指定的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Items in custom categories can be pinned to the Jump List by the user.
trans-unit.target: 在自訂分類中的項目可以固定到跳躍清單，使用者。

trans-unit.source: When an item is pinned, it moves to an automatic category called **Pinned**.
trans-unit.target: 當已釘選的項目時，它會移至呼叫的自動類別目錄**釘選**。

trans-unit.source: The user can also remove items from the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: 使用者也可以從跳躍清單移除項目。

trans-unit.source: The name of the category the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> is grouped with.
The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。
